title: Parker – Inside the (Rob) Parker - RIP Tyler Skaggs; Josh Bell hits bombs;  HR Derby needs Trout; Guests: Former slugger Cecil Fielder, Indians Play-By-Play Voice Tom Hamilton
itunes:title: Parker – Inside the (Rob) Parker - RIP Tyler Skaggs; Josh Bell hits bombs;  HR Derby needs Trout; Guests: Former slugger Cecil Fielder, Indians Play-By-Play Voice Tom Hamilton
description:
Listen to Inside the (Rob) Parker in Podcasts. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/inside-the-rob-parker/id1460750158

This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob pays tribute to the memory of Angels pitcher Tyler SKaggs after his unexpected passing, looks at Pirate's slugger Josh Bell's monster 1st half, why Mike Trout needs to enter thee Home Run Derby at least once. He also names his Top 3 MLB Teams of the Week, names this week's 'Twitter Trash Talk' Winner, and gives the Analytic Stat of the Week.  Guests: Former Tigers/Yankees slugger Cecil Fielder; Longtime Indians play-by play announcer Tom Hamilton talks Cleveland hosting the All-Star Game, and if the Indians can come back and win the AL Central after a slow start.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
